Package array

Class Field

java.lang.Object
array.Field
public final class Field extends Object
Represents a field of a class using Java reflection.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Object
    get(Object obj)
    Returns the value of the field on the supplied object.
    Annotation
    getDeclaredAnnotation(Class<? extends Annotation> annotationType)
    Returns an Annotation object reflecting the annotation provided, or null if this field doesn't have such an annotation.
    Annotation[]
    getDeclaredAnnotations()
    Returns an array of Annotation objects reflecting all annotations declared by this field, or an empty array if there are none.
    Class
    getDeclaringClass()
    Returns the Class object representing the class or interface that declares the field.
    Class
    getElementType(int index)
    If the type of the field is parameterized, returns the Class object representing the parameter type at the specified index, null otherwise.
    String
    getName()
    Returns the name of the field.
    Class
    getType()
    Returns a Class object that identifies the declared type for the field.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name of the field.
      Returns:
      The name of the field.

    • getType

      public Class getType()
      Returns a Class object that identifies the declared type for the field.
      Returns:
      The Class object representing the declared type of the field.

    • getDeclaringClass

      public Class getDeclaringClass()
      Returns the Class object representing the class or interface that declares the field.
      Returns:
      The declaring class of the field.

    • isAccessible

      public boolean isAccessible()
      Checks if the field is accessible.
      Returns:
      true if the field is accessible; otherwise, false.

    • setAccessible

      public void setAccessible(boolean accessible)
      Sets the accessibility of the field.
      Parameters:
      accessible - true to make the field accessible; otherwise, false.

    • isDefaultAccess

      public boolean isDefaultAccess()
      Return true if the field does not include any of the private, protected, or public modifiers.
      Returns:
      true if the field has default (package-private) access; otherwise, false.

    • isFinal

      public boolean isFinal()
      Return true if the field includes the final modifier.
      Returns:
      true if the field is marked as final; otherwise, false.

    • isPrivate

      public boolean isPrivate()
      Return true if the field includes the private modifier.
      Returns:
      true if the field is marked as private; otherwise, false.

    • isProtected

      public boolean isProtected()
      Return true if the field includes the protected modifier.
      Returns:
      true if the field is marked as protected; otherwise, false.

    • isPublic

      public boolean isPublic()
      Return true if the field includes the public modifier.
      Returns:
      true if the field is marked as public; otherwise, false.

    • isStatic

      public boolean isStatic()
      Return true if the field includes the static modifier.
      Returns:
      true if the field is marked as static; otherwise, false.

    • isTransient

      public boolean isTransient()
      Return true if the field includes the transient modifier.
      Returns:
      true if the field is marked as transient; otherwise, false.

    • isVolatile

      public boolean isVolatile()
      Return true if the field includes the volatile modifier.
      Returns:
      true if the field is marked as volatile; otherwise, false.

    • isSynthetic

      public boolean isSynthetic()
      Return true if the field is a synthetic field.
      Returns:
      true if the field is synthetic; otherwise, false.

    • getElementType

      public Class getElementType(int index)
      If the type of the field is parameterized, returns the Class object representing the parameter type at the specified index, null otherwise.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the parameter type to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Class object representing the parameter type at the specified index, or null if not parameterized.

    • isAnnotationPresent

      public boolean isAnnotationPresent(Class<? extends Annotation> annotationType)
      Returns true if the field includes an annotation of the provided class type.
      Parameters:
      annotationType - The class type of the annotation to check.
      Returns:
      true if the field has the specified annotation; otherwise, false.

    • getDeclaredAnnotations

      public Annotation[] getDeclaredAnnotations()
      Returns an array of Annotation objects reflecting all annotations declared by this field, or an empty array if there are none. Does not include inherited annotations.
      Returns:
      An array of Annotation objects representing the field's annotations.

    • getDeclaredAnnotation

      public Annotation getDeclaredAnnotation(Class<? extends Annotation> annotationType)
      Returns an Annotation object reflecting the annotation provided, or null if this field doesn't have such an annotation. This is a convenience function if the caller knows already which annotation type they're looking for.
      Parameters:
      annotationType - The class type of the annotation to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An Annotation object representing the specified annotation, or null if not found.

    • get

      public Object get(Object obj) throws ReflectionException
      Returns the value of the field on the supplied object.
      Parameters:
      obj - The object from which to get the field's value.
      Returns:
      The value of the field on the supplied object.
      Throws:
      ReflectionException - If there is an issue getting the field's value.

    • set

      public void set(Object obj, Object value) throws ReflectionException
      Sets the value of the field on the supplied object.
      Parameters:
      obj - The object on which to set the field.
      value - The value to set in the field.
      Throws:
      ReflectionException - If there is an issue setting the field's value.
